summary: Completed comprehensive testing of CursorCode AI application with new features including Stripe integration, deployment simulation, email verification, and GitHub OAuth

minor_issues.issue: Returns 520 error when GitHub OAuth credentials not configured
minor_issues.impact: GitHub OAuth initiation fails without proper credentials
minor_issues.note: Expected behavior in demo environment without GitHub OAuth credentials

passed_tests: GitHub repos endpoint properly rejects requests without token
Subscription plans endpoint returns all 5 pricing tiers with Stripe integration
Stripe checkout creation works in demo mode
Deployment endpoint creates records with subdomain URLs
AI models endpoint returns 3 xAI Grok models
Frontend loads correctly with GitHub OAuth buttons on login/signup pages
All form fields and navigation work properly
action_item_for_main_agent: GitHub OAuth requires GITHUB_OAUTH_CLIENT_ID and GITHUB_OAUTH_CLIENT_SECRET environment variables to be set for full functionality. All other features working correctly in demo mode.
